Name: VRQ Test
About the game: VRQ (Virtual Reality Quotient) represents your sensitivity to VR. A simple test will help you measure and better understand your sensitivity to VR so that you can have a better VR experience. In 180 seconds, youâ€™ll experience 5 different kinds of dizziness test, which becomes harder with testing time. When you feel dizzy, the program should stop and your VRQ rank will be given according to your testing duration and reaction speed. The rank ranges from 1 to 3 stars. More stars means better sensitivity to VR and much easier for you to accept it.
